look in the left column: what do you want to do with firestarter?
you don't need firestarter unless you want to route network traffic for other computers.
ubuntu does not open any network ports by default, so you are safe without configuring the firewall.
yes, firestarter is suitable for configuring internet sharing if you don't have a router.
